summary: My Gilded Ebony Set is a try to bring back a bit of the feeling that gave The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion to the Players when wearing the Ebony Armor. It is no replacer and not exactly how it was in Oblivion. But i did my best to bring out a lore friendly mod that reminds you of the Oblivion Ebony Armor
descriptionHtml:
With this mod I tried to bring back a bit of the Ebony Armor from The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion.


[b]What does this Mod?[/b]

This Mod adds a heavy and a light Version of my Gilded Ebony Armor and also a complete Weaponset. It is all crafable and temperable under the Ebony Section with the Ebony Smithing perk. As the Oblivion Version was made completely of Ebony Wood - not like in Skyrim - I wanted the Player also to have the Feeling he wears a Gilded Ebony Wood armor what makes it harder to craft it:

[b]CraftingÂ [/b]

You need to craft Ebony Wood under the Misc section with firewood and an Ebonyingot (I know this doesn't really make sense) and to craft a Gilded Ebony Armor or Weapon you also need a Goldingot. To improve your stuff you need another piece of Ebony Wood.
To reward you for your crafting efforts the whole heavy armor is slightly better than dragonscale, the light Armor slightly weaker than Dragonscale and the Weapons as strong as Daedric weapons.

[b]New Feature:[/b]

As Member of The Dark Brotherhood you will find a Ancient Weapon in the Falkreath Sanctuary. - The Ancient Blade of Woe might be greatly known to some Oblivion Fans ;)
Note: Model made from Scratch by me, no Oblivion Import!

If you spy some Bugs let me know and I'll try to fix it.

No DLCs required!
Rate and comment if you like, and enjoy!

[b]Steam Version:[/b]

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=183977053&searchtext=gilded+ebony

[b]Steam Name:

[/b]DoG
author: thetruedragonborn135
